description:
In nova/tests/unit/volume/test_cinder.py, test_create_v3_client_with_microversion_available mocks out the return value for cinderclient.client.get_highest_client_server_version to be whatever the python-cinderclient MAX_VERSION is. The problem is, it is casting this as a float(), so for microversions on the 10's boundary (3.10, 3.20, etc.) this ends up losing the last digit (3.1, 3.2, etc.).

The current release puts the Cinder MAX_VERSION at 3.40, causing this test to fail when requesting the specific version.
title: Cinder client tests cast microversion to a float causing mismatch

comments.content:
In nova/tests/unit/volume/test_cinder.py, test_create_v3_client_with_microversion_available mocks out the return value for cinderclient.client.get_highest_client_server_version to be whatever the python-cinderclient MAX_VERSION is. The problem is, it is casting this as a float(), so for microversions on the 10's boundary (3.10, 3.20, etc.) this ends up losing the last digit (3.1, 3.2, etc.).

The current release puts the Cinder MAX_VERSION at 3.40, causing this test to fail when requesting the specific version.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sean-mcginnis

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/486096
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=0e68f860c22c139c75170d32ca4f196c0cc696be
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 0e68f860c22c139c75170d32ca4f196c0cc696be
Author: Sean McGinnis <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jul 21 05:28:12 2017 -0500

    Don't cast cinderclient microversions to float
    
    Current python-cinderclient release has a MAX_VERSION of 3.40.
    This test mocks the result from getting the max server and
    client version to be whatever is MAX_VERSION, but it was casting
    it to a float, resulting in the max being evaluated at 3.4.
    
    float() can be removed so requests for versions greater than
    3.4 can pass.
    
    Change-Id: I399e2bd7763bc2240752aaa22dea8ff4ee580ab8
    Closes-bug: #1705681
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
